title: DEMO STORE
pargraph: I created a clothing store with React to provide a dynamic and engaging shopping experience for users. React's component-based architecture allowed me to build a responsive and scalable interface, ensuring that customers can easily browse products, filter options, and complete purchases smoothly. By leveraging React, I could focus on optimizing performance, enhancing user interactivity, and integrating modern design elements, all while maintaining flexibility for future updates and growth in the store

title: Concert
pargraph: The concert page is the second project after the landing page. I created it so i can see if can design a concert page if a client asked me to design one.

title: calculator
pargraph: This is just a simple calculator app That calculates whatever expression is entered on the screen. I created it so i could improve on my JS skills.

title: qoute Machine
pargraph: The quote machine is my first react project, Its just a simple app that shows random quotes from famous people. It shows the qoute and the picture of the person who sad the qoute.

title: CountDown Clock
pargraph: The count down clock is my second react project. Its a count clock from 25 minutes, you can select from 25 minutes to 1 minute. depending on how long you want it to run.
